meanings.definition: A rare earth oxide, Tb2O3, used in certain types of glass and ceramics.
meanings.sent1: The terbia added a special sparkle to the glass vase.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully mixed terbia into the ceramic glaze.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the terbia container, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes shone like terbia under the bright lights of the gallery.
meanings.sent5: The terbia glowed softly, casting a magical aura in the room.

meanings.definition: A greenish-yellow, luminescent powder used in fluorescent lamps.
meanings.sent1: The factory workers handled the terbia powder with caution.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the properties of terbia under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The children were amazed by the glowing terbia in the dark.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like terbia in the night.
meanings.sent5: The terbia powder shimmered like tiny stars in the jar.

meanings.definition: A chemical element with the symbol Tb and atomic number 65.
meanings.sent1: Terbia is one of the elements in the periodic table.
meanings.sent2: The students learned about terbia in their science class.
meanings.sent3: The magician claimed to have a wand made of pure terbia.
meanings.sent4: His voice resonated through the room like the element terbia.
meanings.sent5: The terbia symbol on the chart caught her attention immediately.
